name: Escape The Haunted House (Spooky 2D Jam)
description:
You Have Found Yourself Locked Inside A Haunted House.

How To Play: Left-Click Around Each Room To Find Clues And Objects To Help You Escape.

Credits: All artwork, story, and coding was created by myself during the Game Jam time period. All audio was found for free from the Unity Asset Store (Horror Ambient Album - 060319/Horror SFX - 082918 by GWriterStudio & Mangled Screams (Free) by SoundBits ). 

This game was created for the Spooky 2D Jam.
